title: Case-Based Learning (CBL) Course Based on Nursing Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Nursing Skills and Three or More Years of Clinical Experience
context.additional_context: Program for practicing nurses to enhance clinical competencies in a limited-technology environment with smartphone accessibility

learning_goals: Learners plan patient status assessments and nursing interventions with 80% accuracy by analyzing real clinical scenarios.
Learners enhance critical thinking skills through diverse patient cases to develop strategies for solving complex problems.
Learners perform emergency response procedures by demonstrating collaborative communication skills in team-based simulations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
